title.rendered: Team Danfoss visits ESAG’s Group CEO

content.rendered:
The senior leadership team of Danfoss, namely Kjell H. Stroem, Emre GÖREN along with Jai Masand and Sohaib Sulaiman called upon Easa Al Gurg, Group CEO, at the ESAG corporate office. As partners of TTE since 1989, the two companies have collectively worked on numerous projects together and continue to stay at the forefront of sustainable innovation.
 
Started as a solo business in 1933, Danfoss is one of the world’s leading suppliers of innovative and energy-efficient solutions. In the meeting Easa Al Gurg and Kjell Stroem shared their similar experiences of working in family owned businesses that, over decades, have grown and diversified into global conglomerates that still set the standard for efficiency and innovation today. Easa Al Gurg congratulated TTE on receiving the Danfoss Performance Award for 2022 and Premium Partner Certificate, 2023.
